---
title: DeleteWorkflowDefinition
tags:
  - workflow automation
  - workflow
  - Delete Workflow Definition
  - workflow automation API
metaDescription: "Used to delete all the workflow definition versions with the specified name."
freshnessValidatedDate: never
---

This API deletes all the workflow definition versions with the specified name.

<Callout variant="important">
- In order to delete a definition, there must be no schedules using the definition. If the definition is currently used by a schedule, deleting the definition will fail and return an error accordingly.
- All running workflow runs will continue to completion even if the definition is deleted.
</Callout>

## Input parameters

<table>
  <thead>
    <tr>
      <th style={{ width: "200px" }}>Parameter</th>
      <th>Type</th>
      <th>Required</th>
      <th>Description</th>
    </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
    <tr>
      <td>`definition.name`</td>
      <td>String</td>
      <td>Yes</td>
      <td>The name of the workflow definition to delete. All versions with this name will be deleted.</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>`scope.id`</td>
      <td>String</td>
      <td>Yes</td>
      <td>Your account ID.</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>`scope.type`</td>
      <td>Enum</td>
      <td>Yes</td>
      <td>The scope type (ACCOUNT).</td>
    </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>

## Sample request

```graphql
  mutation {
    workflowAutomationDeleteWorkflowDefinition(
      definition: {name: "my-workflow"}
      scope: {id: "12345678", type: ACCOUNT}
    ) {
      definition {
        name
      }
    }
  }
```

## Sample response

The mutation returns:

```graphql
{
  "data": {
    "workflowAutomationDeleteWorkflowDefinition": null
  },
  "extensions": {
    "nrOnly": {
      "_docs": "https://pages.datanerd.us/unified-api/nerdgraph-documentation/querying/debugging/",
      "httpRequestLog": [
        {
          "body": "{\"query\":\"mutation {\\n  deleteWorkflowDefinition(definition: { name: \\\"my-workflow\\\" }, scope: { id: \\\"12345678\\\", type: ACCOUNT }) {\\n    __typename\\n    definition {\\n      __typename\\n      name\\n    }\\n  }\\n}\",\"extensions\":{\"authorizedAccountIds\":{\"error\":\"Failed to fetch Authorized Account Ids.\",\"value\":null,\"success\":false}},\"variables\":{}}",
          "curl": "echo  | base64 -D | curl -i -X POST 'https://ng-workflow-service.service.nr-ops.net/graphql' -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -H 'X-Login-Context: access-token:' -H 'newrelic-originating-region-id: 1' -d @-"
        },
        {
          "body": "{\"query\":\"query($capabilities: [String!]!, $scopeType: ScopeType!) {\\n  actor {\\n    capabilities(filter: {names: $capabilities}, scopeType: $scopeType) {\\n      name\\n    }\\n  }\\n}\\n\",\"variables\":{\"capabilities\":[\"internal.read.nerd_graph_debug_data\"],\"scopeType\":\"GLOBAL\"}}",
          "curl": "echo  | base64 -D | curl -i -X POST 'https://ng-authorization-service.service.nr-ops.net/graphql' -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -H 'X-Login-Context: access-token:' -d @-"
        }
      ]
    }
  },
  "errors": [
    {
      "message": "User is not authorized.",
      "path": [
        "workflowAutomationDeleteWorkflowDefinition"
      ],
      "extensions": {
        "classification": "DataFetchingException",
        "errorClass": "ACCESS_DENIED",
        "nrOnly": {
          "owningTeam": "#help-nomad"
        }
      },
      "locations": [
        {
          "line": 2,
          "column": 3
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}
```
